q1: How does PDF to PowerPoint work?
a1: Each PDF page is rendered as a high-quality image and placed as a full-page slide in the PowerPoint file. The slide dimensions match the original page size.
q2: How does PowerPoint to PDF work?
a2: The tool extracts text content from each PPTX slide and generates a clean landscape PDF document. Complex elements like animations may not be fully replicated.
a3: All processing happens in your browser. Your files never leave your device.
